Well, one of the main tells that we tell people to look
for is bad grammar.
A lot of times the phishers are not
native English speakers, and they're writing in English.
And it looks like it.

okay, maybe this is a little suspicious,
especially if it seems to be claiming to come from an American company or a British company.
And yet the English is not very correct.
So that would be a good clue.
Another thing that we've often told people to look for

if it's a not applicable to you.
